banking.server

类 Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • banking.server.Account
  • 所有已实现的接口:

    直接已知子类:

    class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Account>

      • Account

        Account(java.lang.String firstName,
        java.lang.String lastName)
        It initializes one account.
        参数:
        firstName: - the first name of the owner
        lastName: - the last name of the owner

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAccountType

        java.lang.String getAccountType()
        This method returns the account type.
        返回:
        the account type

      • getCardNum

        java.lang.String getCardNum()
        This method returns the card number.
        返回:
        the card number

      • comparePsw

        boolean comparePsw(java.lang.String enteredPsw)
        This method is used to judge whether the user has entered matched password.
        参数:
        enteredPsw: - the password user entered
        返回:
        true if the user entered right password; false if the user entered wrong one.

      • modifyPsw

        void modifyPsw(java.lang.String newPassword)
        This method modify the password of account.
        参数:
        newPassword: - the new password user entered.

      • getBalance

        double getBalance()
        You can invoke this method to get the amount of balance.
        返回:
        value of balance

      • deposit

        boolean deposit(double amount)
        You can invoke this method to deposit.
        参数:
        amount: - the amount that will be deposited
        返回:
        successfully deposited

      • withdraw

        void withdraw(double amount)
       throws OverdraftException
        You can invoke this method to withdraw money. And before the operation comes into effect, it will check whether the balance is sufficient.
        参数:
        amount: - the amount that will be withdrew
        抛出:
        OverdraftException - the balance is insufficient to afford the withdrew amount

      • nameToString

        java.lang.String nameToString()
        This method generates the name of String type.
        返回:
        first name and last name separated by a comma.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Account o)
        This method can sort the cards by ascending order.
        指定者:
        compareTo 在接口中 java.lang.Comparable<Account>
        参数:
        o: - other Account in the list.
        返回:
        1 if current card number is larger than o's; 0 if current card number is equal to o's; -1 if current card number is less than o's.
